title: Can a brother and sister sleep in the same bed with a pillow in between
transcript: from Bangladesh my question was I am 18 years old and my younger brother is 15 we sleep on two sides of the same bed separated by a pillow in the middle we cover our hour while sleeping is this permissible should we do this we have an extra room alhamdulillah but I'm am afraid to sleep alone you sleep with sleep with whom on the bed yeah you sleep with whom with my younger brother no no this is not permissible at all
